name: Harden Simms

topics.response_text: You did it! You disarmed that thing!{excited}
My dad, of course. He teaches me to shoot, and about the law, and keeping people safe. When he's not busy protecting the town, that is.

topics.topic_text: What do you think of Megaton?
topics.response_text: I dunno... I used to like it, but ever since dad... I dunno...{He misses his dead father.}
There's the Stahls. They run the Brass Lantern. I go there to eat with my dad sometimes. Doc Church runs the clinic.

topics.topic_text: That's all I needed to know.

conversation.response_text: You might wear his badge, but you're not my dad.
You said we could take that trip. Up north, you know? To see one of the old towns? Come on, dad, you promised....
I just... You know. Wanted to help out.
Okay, dad. But I'm going to hold you to it, this time.

description:
Harden Simms is a 10 year-old African American Male.

A 10-year-old resident of Megaton, son of Sheriff Lucas Simms. He follows a strict routine of early bedtimes and early mornings, allowing him time to play with his friend Maggie.

Harden Simms's Personality: Obedient but curious, with a sense of duty instilled by his father. He's somewhat reserved around strangers but friendly with those he knows well.

Harden Simms's Backstory: Born in Megaton in 2267 to Sheriff Lucas Simms and his late wife. His father has taught him the importance of safety and community, instructing him not to talk to strangers. Despite his young age, Harden takes his father's lessons to heart and tries to be a responsible member of the Megaton community. He's formed a close friendship with Maggie, another young resident of Megaton.
